title: DATS data repository schema
description: A repository or catalog of dataset.

name.description: The name of the data repository.

scopes.description: Information about the nature of the datasets in the repository, ideally from a controlled vocabulary or ontology (e.g. transcription profile, sequence reads, molecular structure, image, DNA sequence, NMR spectra).

type.description: A descriptor (ideally from a controlled vocabulary) providing information about the type of repository, such as primary resource or aggregator.

licenses.description: The terms of use of the data repository.

version.description: A release point for the repository, when applicable.

publishers.description: The person(s) or organization(s) responsible for the repository and its availability.

aggregatorOf.description: The DataRepositories aggregated by this repository. This property will be empty for primary repositories.
